content.raw:
Ok so guys in the lab noticed that the tabs don't display icons anymore when not being dragged.
I'll removed the new tabs from our lab again until this is fixed, as it's important for quickly finding error states.

This screenshot shows the tab being dragged left and not dragged right.
![tabbug.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xg9BdE/images/2962113669-tabbug.png)
content.html:
Ok so guys in the lab noticed that the tabs don't display icons anymore when not being dragged. I'll removed the new tabs from our lab again until this is fixed, as it's important for quickly finding error states.

This screenshot shows the tab being dragged left and not dragged right.
